text: Aida Brewer is the first female treasurer of the state of New York. Brewer was born March 27, 1955 in Mechanicville. In April of 2002, Governor George Pataki appointed Brewer treasurer. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:People from Mechanicville, New York Category:New York State Treasurers Category:Women in New York (state) politics Category:Living people
title: Aida Brewer
